DocAttribute.Name: VerticalDatum
MapProjection
MapZone
MapUnit
DocAttribute.Documentation: Unit of the coordinate axes composing the map coordinate system. > NOTE 1  Only length measures are in scope and all two or three axes of the map coordinate system shall have the same length unit. > NOTE 2  If MapUnit is omited, the unit for the coordinate axes is taken from the default units, as stated in IfcProject.UnitInContext.

DocWhereRule.Name: IsLengthUnit
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The map unit shall be given, if present, as a length unit.
